{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 275 |image=Demonic Illusion.png |kanji=魔幻・樹縛殺 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Magen: Jubaku Satsu |literal english=Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death |english tv=Tree Bind Death |viz manga=Evil Illusion: Tree Capture Death |game names=Demon Illusion: Tree Binding Death
Evil Illusion: Tree Bind Kill
Genjutsu: Sylvan Fetters[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]] |jutsu rank=B |jutsu classification=Genjutsu |jutsu type=Yin Release |jutsu class type=Supplementary |jutsu range=Short |users=Kurenai Yūhi, Mirai Sarutobi, Unkai Kurama~anime, Sakura Haruno~game |hand signs=Dog, Snake, Monkey, Ox, Tiger |debut manga=141 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=81 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |novel debut=Konoha Shinden: Steam Ninja Scrolls |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Novel, Game }} The target experiences the [[illusion]] of a tree coiling around them, preventing them from moving. Because targets are immobile yet still conscious, this technique is a useful way to perform interrogations. Alternatively, users can simply kill the immobilised targets; when [[Kurenai Yūhi]] attempts to do this, she emerges from the tree above the target to cut their throat.''Naruto'' chapter 141 This technique has been passed down through the generations among [[Konohagakure]]'s villagers. It was originally created during the time of [[Hashirama Senju]], intended to make victims believe they were fighting Hashirama himself and his [[Wood Release]].''Konoha Shinden'' chapter 1, page 44 == References == [[es:Ilusión Demoníaca: Muerte de Prisión Arborea]] [[fr:Illusion Démoniaque - Puissante Illusion Distordante]] [[pl:Magen: Jubaku Satsu]] [[pt-br:Ilusão Demoníaca: Aprisionamento da Árvore Assassina]]
